caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI`I, Petitioner/Plaintiff-Appellee v. DANIEL E. K. SHINYAMA,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CR. NO. 99-0457(2))
opinion.attorneys: Arleen Y. Watanabe, Deputy Prosecuting Attorney, for petitioner/plaintiff-appellee, on the writ

center.italic: ORDER GRANTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_text: Petitioner/Plaintiff-Appellee State of Hawaii's Application for Writ of Certiorari filed on February 8, 2002 is hereby granted.
